mapper.select: select distinct(tc.CAR_NO),tc.CAR_PLATE_NO,tc.CAR_BRAND_ID,tc.CAR_BRAND_NAME,tc.CAR_MODEL_ID,tc.CAR_MODEL_NAME,tc.CAR_PHOTO_URL1,tcs.POWER,tcs.MILEAGE,tcs.RANGE_MILEAGE from t_car tc,t_car_status tcs where tc.CAR_NO=tcs.CAR_NO AND tc.ONLINE_STATUS= 1 AND tc.DEVICE_ID != '0' AND tc.DEVICE_ID is not null AND tc.DEVICE_ID !='' AND tcs.USERAGE_STATUS = 0 AND (tcs.CAR_STATUS is null OR tcs.CAR_STATUS = 2) AND tcs.LOCATION_PARK_NO = #{0} ORDER BY tcs.POWER DESC
